Name: Overall weight
Description: Total student weightâ€”sums to the national student population

Name: Student self-confidence in math
Description: Categorical variable indicating high, medium or low level of self-confidence, Students Confident in Mathematics/IDX,   1: Very Confident in Mathematics; 2: Somewhat Confident in Mathematics; 3: Not Confident in Mathematics

Name: How often test language spoken at home
Description: Categorical variable indicating always, almost always, sometimes, never,  1: I always speak <language of test> at home; 2: I almost always speak <language of test> at home; 3: I sometimes speak <language of test> and sometimes speak another language at home; 4: I never speak <language of test> at home

Name: Index of school safety
Description: Categorical variable indicating high, medium or low perception of safety,  1: Agree a lot; 2: Agree a little; 3: Disagree a little; 4: Disagree a lot

Name: Family Socioeconomic status
Description: Index based on a summation of family possessions related to learning (computer/tablet, desk/table, own room, Internet connection,own mobile phone)

Name: Gini index
Description: External measure of country's inequality  levels (Source: World Bank, CIA World Fact Book, Taiwan government Web site)
